name: The Wave Cat
description:
Help Energy to scape from his captors! Find the Primary Colors by using his wave and feed them to make him faster! Avoid all the obstacle and make the fastest run!

Jam Site: GranadaJam

Diversifiers: The colour and the shape:A colour-based game that can also be played by people who have any kind of difficulty seeing colour.

Platforms: MS Windows

Instructions:

Open the exacutable and hit play (Set resolution to 1980x720) Left lick to show the colors, Up and down to move

Credits:

Timur Sorokin

Pablo Vives

Pedro Ollero
